name: Akshay
tagline: Full-stack developer passionate about open-source and creative projects.
about: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love building innovative solutions and contributing to open-source projects. My journey in software development has been driven by curiosity and a desire to create meaningful digital experiences.

projects.name: Multi-View Portfolio
projects.desc: An interactive portfolio with CLI terminal and modern design views, built with React and TypeScript.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.desc: A full-stack task management application with real-time updates and collaborative features.

projects.name: Automatic scholl bell
projects.desc: An automatic school bell system using esp8266.

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.desc: Leading development of scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.desc: Developed responsive user interfaces and improved application performance. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.desc: Built and maintained web applications using React and Node.js. Gained experience in agile development methodologies and version control.
